entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
